item.title: Turkish Lira Plunges as Attempted Coup is Underway
item.description:
Turkish Lira Plunges as Attempted Coup is Underway

The Turkish Lira has fallen at least 5 per cent as reported by Reuters. This is a 3 week low against the US dollar. At the time of writing Turkish Lira was seen trading at 3.0300 Lira against the greenback.

item.title: Ripple: It's Time for a Blockchain Cross-Border Payment Network
item.description:
Ripple: It's Time for a Blockchain Cross-Border Payment Network

Distributed ledger technology (DLT) has yet to achieve widespread use, but it is mature enough to begin commercial use. Ripple, a DLT technology provider, believes the time is ripe for banks to work together to initiate a network for more efficient inter-bank and cross-border payments, according to a white paper by Ripple and Accenture.

item.title: David Gunn: "Not Participating in Blockchain Research Is Not A Viable Option For Banks"
item.description:
David Gunn: "Not Participating in Blockchain Research Is Not A Viable Option For Banks"

The blockchain industry has come to an interesting crossroads. On the one hand, major banks are pushing to deploy this technology as soon as possible. But on the other hand, there are those who think this is all just hype and do not see a first mover advantage.

item.title: Coinbase Tracks User Funds Leaving The Exchange's Wallets
item.description:
Coinbase Tracks User Funds Leaving The Exchange's Wallets

A new debate has been taking place on Reddit today, as some users complain how Coinbase tracks the funds being purchased through their exchange platform. BitBet, one of the many Bitcoin gambling websites, had one user "threatened" by Coinbase after placing a bet on their site.

item.title: Forex Expert: Bitcoin Should Be Taken More Seriously
item.description:
Forex Expert: Bitcoin Should Be Taken More Seriously

Forex trading instructor for DailyFX and ex-JPMorgan Chase forex trader, Tyler Yell, recently explained why Bitcoin should be taken seriously. Yell made the case that in times of market duress, including a period of economic collapse, Bitcoin acts like digital gold. DailyFx is the research website of Forex Capital Markets (FXCM), an online Foreign exchange market broker.

item.title: Is Bitcoin About to Breakout? Charts Suggest So
item.description:
Is Bitcoin About to Breakout? Charts Suggest So

Several factors have lead to a surge in the price of Bitcoin this year. One of the main factors has been the instability in China and Bitcoin emerging as somewhat of a safe haven. The Brexit referendum too led to price hikes in Bitcoin.

item.title: Time To Buy Bitcoin With Brazilian Real Before Its Value is Suppressed
item.description:
Time To Buy Bitcoin With Brazilian Real Before Its Value is Suppressed

More and more countries are continuing to struggle with the value of their local currency. While China is devaluing the Yuan, the Brazil real must not get too strong, or risk hurting export otherwise. Economic volatility has never been a good thing, but things seem to get out of hand in several countries now.

item.title: North Carolina Bitcoin Law Arrives with Side-Effects, Experts Say
item.description:
North Carolina Bitcoin Law Arrives with Side-Effects, Experts Say

Recent North Carolina Bitcoin law is a step in the right direction, leaving room for improvement but may arrive with its own side-effects. On July 6 2016, the Governor of North Carolina, Pat McCrory, signed a long-debated Bitcoin bill into law.

item.title: Industry Report: Steemit Is the Latest Victim of Cyber Crime
item.description:
Industry Report: Steemit Is the Latest Victim of Cyber Crime

Russia pushes bitcoin, Mark Karpeles goes free, another massive crowdsale in the books, and Steemit gets hacked. Want to catch up on the latest cryptocurrency news? Take a look at the stories below. Also read: Industry Report: Bitcoin Bursts with 'Energy' Once again, a Russian party is pushing for the legalization of Bitcoin.

item.title: Bitcoin Scam Site Warning - Angel Wealth
item.description:
Bitcoin Scam Site Warning - Angel Wealth

Bitcoins cam sites are trying to be more clever than the average user these days. Accepting other payment methods, as well as Bitcoin, is one way to avoid suspicion. But in the end, we will track them all down, and Angel Wealth is no exception to this rule.
